A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi employs a cheap and easy brand of Star Wars\, disrespectful of the soulful mythology and characters of Star Wars. Whilst George Lucas' Star Wars was a timeless epic of conflicted personal emotion and familial relationships (sometimes clumsily portrayed)\, it seems the Disney Star Wars is a visually beautiful and instantaneously gratifying feast with almost zero mythological value.
